name: Shootem' Dragons
description:
CONTROLS:

Control with WASD, shoot with space if auto fire is turned off. 

By default auto fire is turned on, but you can toggle it off in the main menu.

By killing enemies, you build up a combo, thus getting a higher score. Getting hurt will reset the combo.

HIGHSCORES:

revanoushydra (dev) - 235,090

Jopa - 38,040

SUMMARY:

Dragons are invading, and it is your duty to shootem' all.

Shoot dragons, dodge fireballs, receive upgrades, and fight the leader of the dragon invasion, all while building up a huge new high score.

Post a screenshot of your highscores and you'll be added to the leaderboard.

CREDITS:

SFX by SoundsByDane

Music by timbeek.com

###

I only worked on the project for 3 days instead of the full 10 days the jam has provided since I've joined late and had my university semester starting soon.
